main.name: Climate Warriors
main.description: Play to reduce real life CO2 emissions! You can plant seeds in your climate garden, take care of your garden, capture CO2 and produce fresh AIR
main.bio: We are on a mission to develop the next generation game. Under the hood we are using defi-mechanics, Non Fungible Tokens and real-world Co2 credits. We keep gameplay clean and simple providing a low barrier to enter for people less familiar with Web3. For detailed information see our development doc:
main.dapp: Please check out our beta Dapp. We use DeFi-mechanics for yield generation to buy as many Co2 tokens as humanly possible. The beta dapp is our in-house playground for experimentation and buidling the game mechanics.
main.roadmap: We love to see a sustainable future for generations to come. Please explore our roadmap to find out how we envisage the future. Let's build a bright future together, we're open for all kind of wild ideas
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.
